name: 李宜桓
objective: Teach the basic concepts and various reaction mechanisms of polymer materials, and introduce related application examples. Students can systematically understand the molecular design and application directions of polymer systems.
schedule:
1.  Introduction to polymers (2 week)  
2.  Polymer structures and morphologies (2 week) 
3.  Step growth polymerization (2 week)
4.  Applications of polymer materials from step growth polymerization (2 week)
     
     Mid-term Exam (1 week)

5.  Chain growth polymerization (2 week)
6.  Applications of polymer materials from chain growth polymerization (1~2 
     week)
7.  Copolymerization (1~2 week)
8.  Copolymerization applications (2 week)

Final Report (2 week)
materials:
1. “Textbook of Polymer Science”, 3rd Edition, F. W. Billmeyer, Jr., John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
2. “Polymer Chemistry”, 5th Edition, C. E. Carraher, Jr., Marcel Dekker, Inc.
